    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Sigma orbital of hydrogen molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sigma Orbital des Wasserstoffmoleküls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orbitale de sigma de molécule d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orbital do sigma da molécula do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbital di sigma della molecola dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιακός σίγμα του μορίου υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orbitario de la sigma de la molécula del 
hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the sigma bond formation of two s orbitals of two hydrogen atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical bonding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">s orbital</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sigma bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Sigmabindungsanordnung 
von zwei s Orbitals von zwei Wasserstoffatomen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation 
d'obligation de sigma de deux orbitales de s de deux atomes 
d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação da 
ligação do sigma de dois orbitals de s de dois átomos do 
hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione del 
legame di sigma di due orbitals di s di due atomi dell'idrogeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σχηματισμό δεσμών σίγμα 
δύο τροχιακοων του s δύο ατόμων υδρογόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación del 
enlace de la sigma de dos orbitarios de s de dos átomos del 
hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
